Features¶

This is a very basic and small sript, so at the moment it only have a few features.

  1. Downloads a Single Chapter and puts in a directory with the comic name, volume and chapter.

  2. Downloads all the chapters available for a series.

  3. Skip if the file has already been downloaded.

  4. Show human readable error(s) in most places.

comic-dl
